LanguageData.Apparello_Furxhood.label: 皮质头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Furxhood.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of nimble furxhide. You can almost feel the spirit of this cunning beast within you。
LanguageData.Apparell_ArcticWolfHood.label: 狼头盔
LanguageData.Apparell_ArcticWolfHood.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of nimble furxhide. You can almost feel the spirit of this cunning beast within you。
LanguageData.Apparello_Rimramhood.label: 冲击头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Rimramhood.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of enduring Rimram hide. You can almost feel the spirit of this stubborn beast within you。
LanguageData.Apparel_WarVeil.label: Chitin Head Garment
LanguageData.Apparel_WarVeil.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of shiny chitin. You can almost feel the spirit of this intelligent beast within you。
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalHeaddress.label: Feathered Headdress
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalHeaddress.description: This feathered headdress offers little in the way of protection, however anyone who wears it feels the spirit of the warrior stirring from deep within。
LanguageData.Apparello_ohlala.label: 闪亮头冠
LanguageData.Apparello_ohlala.description: An awe inspiring crown. It makes your subject's hearts beat ever so faster around you。
LanguageData.Apparello_Snorkhood.label: 獠牙头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Snorkhood.description: A head piece that was lovingly crafted out of tusk. You can almost feel the spirit of this slumbering beast within you。
